Etsy API Client¶

class etsy.API_client(verbose)[source]¶
check_response(response)[source]¶

Checks REST API response to ensure resource and API key are OK.

get_shop(shop_name)[source]¶

Gets Shop data: title and announcement.

Parameters:shop_name (str) – Shop name.
Returns:Shop data including title and announcement.
Return type:dict
get_shop_listings(lock, shop_name, position, page=1, pbar=None)[source]¶

Retrieves data for an Etsy shop’s listings.

In case there are more listings than the pagination limit, recursively retrieves subsequent pages until all listings are compiled.

Parameters:
  • lock (_thread.lock) – Thead lock for non-thread-safe tqdm progress bar updates.
  • shop_name (str) – Shop name.
  • position (int) – Position in list of names, for positioning of progress bar.
  • page (int) – Page for paginated results.
  • pbar (tqdm._tqdm.tqdm) – Progress bar for listings download.
Returns:

List of product listings. In recursive calls, also returns next page.
Return type:

list or tuple
url(path)[source]¶

Provides a URL for making REST API requests.

Returns:URL containing API root path, API command, and API key.
Return type:str
